statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences

SELECT ar_controls, ar_color_scheme FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC

SELECT background_color, font_size, language FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 10;
SELECT user_id, ar_theme, ar_sound_enabled, ar_notifications_enabled FROM ar_settings WHERE ar_sound_enabled = true;
